document.heading: Trash Compactor Tax Incentive Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-223, the “Trash Compactor Tax Incentive Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-81. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 18, 2014, and Dec. 2, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 23, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-538 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-223 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
